title: 1907-09 H.M. Taylor Tigers Postcard Ty Cobb
author: mannybb24

posts.post_title: 1907-09 H.M. Taylor Tigers Postcard Ty Cobb
posts.post_content:
I don't really collect anything other than Negro and Latin American baseball items but got this postcard and it just came back from SGC.
It's nice, not sure where to price it but SGC4 and PSA4's have been selling in the $1800-2k range so I'll throw out SOLD or best offer on this one.
I'm up for trades as well.

Paypal F/F option or add 3%
Ships Free
Thank you, Steve
If you can't get a hold of me on here just shoot me an email, [url]speissig@hotmail.com[/url]

SOLD

Very nice card

Good luck with it
